ai-mil3.6.11:1.2_0: “Venerable Sir, when there’s an abiding that there’s much of them, or do the hunter comes up?”
ai-mil3.6.11:1.4_0: “But sir, there’s no-one born in them. Now there’s no calling them a hundredth.”
ai-mil3.6.11:1.5_0: “Great king, there’s no-one mindfulness, there’s no work connected with knowledge, nearby, and some workable. There’s something to be done for the teacher or other of the three fields.”
ai-mil3.6.11:4.1_0: The sixth sub-chapter on mindfulness is finished.
